arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers and Luton Town have seen bids for FC. St Gallen’s Willem Geubbels rejected, with Sunderland now expected to add their name to the list of bidders. That’s according to Foot Mercato, who say the Swiss side are showing no interest in selling the 23-year-old in this window.
